title: What are the best Hindi song lyrics that you have heard recently? - Quora

response.answer_text: Few days ago i was travelling by train & as you know politics flows in air on that time. So I kept my headphone ON and played my fav list. After few songs i took some refreshment and went near to gate & then this song came. With a perfect veiw & fresh air , a song with a great voice with a great lyrics should be one of the best feelings ever and yeah i was feeling it.Here is that song with its great lyrics :) Der Lagi Lekin Shankar Mahadevan Movie - ZNMD Der lagi lekin Maine ab hai jeena seekh liya Jaise bhi ho din Maine ab hai jeena seekh liya Ab maine Yeh jaana hai, khushi hai kya, gumm kya Dono hi, do pal ki hai ruttein Na yeh thehre na rukey Zindagi do rangon se bane Ab roothe ab maane Yehi toh hai, yehi toh hai, yahaan Der lagi lekin Maine ab hai jeena seekh liya Aansuon ke bin Maine ab hai jeena seekh liya Ab maine Yeh jaana hai kise kahoon apna Hai koi, jo yeh mujhse keh gaya Yeh kahan tu reh gaya Zindagi toh hai jaise karvaan Tu hai tanha kab yahan Sabhi toh hai, sabhi toh hai yahaan Koi sunaaye joh hassti muskaraati kahani Kehta hai dil, main bhi sunu Aansu bhi moti ho jo kisi ke nishaani Kehta hai dil main bhi chunu Baahein dil ki ho baahon mein chalta Chalun yunhi raahon mein Bus yunhi, ab yahan, kab wahan Der lagi lekin Maine ab hai jeena seekh liya Aansuon ke bin Maine ab hai jeena seekh liya Hai koi, jo yeh mujhse keh gaya Yeh kahan tu reh gaya Zindagi, toh hai jaise karvaan Tu hai tanha kab yahan Sabhi toh hai, sabhi toh hai yahaan (sabhi toh hai, sabhi toh hai yahaan) I tried so hard to share the English translation but they (Musixmatch) aren't allowing to share the translation :( If you have this app then you should see its English translation which begins with this great line - LATE ! but i have learnt to live now :)

This is actually a really old song…Like of the 70s, but I came across it recently on my mom's recommendation… It's called ‘zindagi ke safar mein guzar jaate hain jo mukaam’ by kishore kumar and it has really awesome lyrics
